summary:
"The Blues Brothers" is a funny action movie from 1980. It stars John Belushi and Dan Aykroyd as brothers Jake and Elwood, who are on a mission to save their old orphanage. They need to raise $5,000 by playing music with their band. The film is full of great music from famous artists like James Brown and Aretha Franklin.

The movie was made in Chicago and had some problems during filming. It cost a lot of money because of car chases and Belushi's partying. But it was a big hit and is now considered a classic. There's even a sequel called "Blues Brothers 2000."
title: The Blues Brothers (film)
